message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond your initial assessment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a bit steep at $22,000.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? This reflects the product's true value.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $14,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
